description:
Do you want to secure a new role in the shortest time?

Do you want to make a career change and start a new career or job that fulfills you?

Do you want to know the secrets that employers won’t tell you but the best job hunters use everyday to find themselves great roles in the shortest time?

Based on research amongst 100’s of employers, recruiters and thousands of applicants, this course reveals for the first time the 10 key secrets that employers don't tell you, the secret tactics of the most successful job hunters and career changers and how to employ them.

Providing a fresh new approach to developing your career, these 10 tried and tested strategies will transform your job hunt from a time consuming, frustrating endeavour, to a successful and empowering outcome in the shortest time and help you find your right job right now.

Do you want to know the smallest changes to your job hunting that will have the greatest effect?

If so 'The Top Ten Secrets to Finding the Right Job Right Now' course reveals the secrets of employers and the best job hunters and unveils the most successful tactics to identify the right job and secure it in the shortest time.

With these secrets in your possession you will learn how to secure a job you’ll love in the shortest time and never have to be between jobs again.

The course includes over 2 and a half hours of live content that is broken down into 10 units covering each of the 10 secrets for your convenience.
title: Accelerate Your Career in 30 Days
